subject: Good day,
body:
Good day,
This is Barrister Mr.Abeg Oliva from Benin that signed for your
compensation fund with amount of $3.5million usd ordered from United
Nation to receive. I mailed to know why you refused to receive the
fund by ATM card through company or do you want Government to receive
the funds back? Please I am waiting for your respond.
Barrister Abeg Oliva
+22969452519

subject: Re: Good day,
body:
Dear Barrister Oliva,

I'm sorry for any confusion, but I believe there may be a misunderstanding. I have not refused to receive any funds. Could you please provide more details about this situation?

Best wishes,
Jennifer

subject: Re: Good day,
body:
This is Barrister Mr. Abeg Oliva from Benin Republic signed your payment
in the amount of $3.5million usd ordered by United Nation to receive ATM
card from DHL company,

Main purpose of receiving the fund is that Government of Benin want to
restore image of their Country by compensate 5 foreigner peoples scammed in
the Country for some Years Ago and you are among of the 5 people foreigner.

Which you advice to send your delivery address for me to meet the company
and know what holding to complete the delivery with you, send below;

Full name...
 Delivery address:...
 Whatsapp communication:...

 I am waiting to receive the above needed,

 Thank you,
 Barrister Abeg Oliva
 +22969452519

subject: Re: Good day,
body:
Dear Barrister Abeg Oliva,

Thank you for your email. I am surprised to hear about this compensation, as I was not aware that I had been scammed. However, if the Government of Benin has indeed ordered a payment in my name, I would be happy to receive it.

Here are my details:

Full Name: John Doe
Address: 123 Main Street, Anytown, USA

Please let me know what the next steps are.

Best wishes,
Jennifer

subject: How are you doing today and your family? I mailed to know the purpose of all this quiet or does mean you didn't received my messages or you did not understand what I explained on its? Simple check and tell me if you are not willing send the fee to complete the delivery as i explained to you so that I will stop disturbing you for the compensation issue. Please i am waiting to hear from you as soon as possible you got my message
body:
How are you doing today and your family? I mailed to know the purpose of
all this quiet or does mean you didn't received my messages or you did not
understand what I explained on its? Simple check and tell me if you are not
willing send the fee to complete the delivery as i explained to you so that
I will stop disturbing you for the compensation issue. Please i am waiting
to hear from you as soon as possible you got my message

subject: Re: Good day,
body:
By this mail, be informed that I have concluded the verification as I
promised to meet the delivery company to know the problem they did not
complete your delivery, which they charged  $175usd only for security
keeping fee by saving the ATM card in their Office getting to two years now
and if you didn't pay them the money that they will not deliver the package
to you. so that`s what hold the delivery now.

Even I went to the bank where an ATM card was issued and if they will help
transfer the funds to you through their service and they said that
Affidavit Certificate is needed for Representative Paper to stand in your
name, or you come down here and sign for the payment, which. without that
they will not try the fund to transfer, I called Court for the Papers and
charged $210usd.

So you should choose where you prefer to receive the fund from out of the
two options, get back to me so I can guide you on how to send the money to
them to complete the process.

Thank you,
Barrister Abeg Oliva
+22969452519
